title: RoboCop.1080p.AC3(DD).5.1ch.Blu-ray.ps3.Bricktop
description:
*******Bricktop HD for PS3*********  

               This is meant for playback on **PS3**
Tested on Sony Playstation 3 (Firmware 2.76) with a large screen HDTV                
                ## This file will play on a ##
     ##-CPU-## With PowerDvD,VLC Media Player,
     ##-MAC-## using roxio toast video player 3.0 
     ##-X-Box-360-## releases do work if you're running windows 7 and streaming                            on the network through windows media center. 

This file is kept under 4 gigs for easy storage (Dang FAT32!)
Hi quality 2-pass H.264 standard encoding


RoboCop (1987)

In a distant & crime ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg with submerged memories haunting him.




Codec..........: H.264
Resolution.....: 1920x1080
Bitrate........: 5.3 Mbps
Framerate......: 24fps
Audio..........: AC3 Dolby Digital 5.1CH Surround (640Kb)
Subtitles......: None
Extension......: M2TS


Please if you like the movie PLEASE SEED it so others can enjoy it to.

PLEASE NO PRIVATE MESSAGES ASKING WHAT PROGRAMS I USE. I WONT RESPOND TO THESE ANYMORE!!!!!!!!!
***AnyDvD = Rip Blu-rays.***
